肖.definition: similar; resembling; to resemble; to be like

肖像.definition: portrait (painting, photo etc); (in a general sense) representation of a person; likeness

肖想.definition: (Tw) to dream of having (sth one cannot possibly have); to covet (sth beyond one's grasp) (from Taiwanese 數想, Tai-lo pr. [siàu-siūnn])

肖揚.definition: Xiao Yang (1938-), president of the PRC Supreme Court 1998-2008

肖蛸.definition: variant of 蠨蛸|蟏蛸[xiao1 shao1]

肖邦.definition: Frédéric Chopin (1810-1849), Polish pianist and composer
